headline: Front-Door Camera at Victim’s House Captures a Grinning Man’s Confession
abstract: “I killed Jennifer,” the man said before his arrest, according to the authorities. The episode is one of several recent examples of doorbell cameras yielding footage that becomes useful to the local authorities.
lead_paragraph: A man was captured on home security camera footage confessing to the murder of his sister on Friday, shortly after she was stabbed to death in a Texas home, the authorities said.
